attributes.description:
THIS VEHICLE HAS BEEN FACTORY ARMOURED TO A B4 BULLET PROOF LEVEL. 

Level B4 covers all the handgun calibre’s likely to be encountered in general crime and hijacking scenarios. Handguns are commonly used due to the ease with which they can be concealed.

The above pricing does not include licencing, registration or administration costs. Please contact any of our sales executives for more information, to reserve a viewing or to apply for finance. Trade ins are welcome and we can deliver countrywide.

attributes.description:
The example is a 2011 Kia Soul. It’s an excellent partner to start of your career with, it’s reliable and light on fuel. Features include power steering, electric windows, central locking remote, radio/CD player, air conditioning and excellent legroom for both driver and rear passengers. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
 This vehicle was reduced from R125 995 to R109 995.
attributes.title: 2011 Kia Soul 1.6
